name: @devmount/sloth.css
description: A drop-in utility component CSS-only library for lazy mammals.

scripts.build:complete: npx postcss src/sloth.css -u postcss-import -u cssnano -o sloth.min.css --no-map
scripts.build:core: npx postcss src/sloth.core.css -u postcss-import -u cssnano -o sloth.core.min.css --no-map
scripts.build:util: npx postcss src/sloth.util.css -u postcss-import -u cssnano -o sloth.util.min.css --no-map
scripts.build:comp: npx postcss src/sloth.comp.css -u postcss-import -u cssnano -o sloth.comp.min.css --no-map
scripts.build: npm run build:complete && npm run build:core && npm run build:util && npm run build:comp
